name: Chaos Reborn - From the Creator of the Original X-COM
blurb: Fast Paced, Fun, Tactics RPG with Monsters, Magic and Mayhem - Online Multiplayer, Rankings, Co-op, and a Huge Single Player Campaign

rewards.reward: UNDISBELIEVER: Our gratitude for showing interest in Chaos Reborn. I hope you join us for the full experience in the future.

APPRENTICE: A digital downloadable version of the game, DRM free, for either Windows, Mac or Linux.\r\nEarly access to development versions, alpha and beta.\r\nCreate your player account and your wizard name for online modes. PLUS you will get a PDF of our stunning Chaos Reborn Art book and Game Guide, and downloadable versions of the music tracks - exclusive to backers (not available with the public release).

FORGEMASTER:
Everything in Apprentice tier - the game, the art and game guide, the music - PLUS
create a rare set of magical equipment - a staff, a robe, a hat - which you will own from the start.
Name your equipment (following our naming policy) and define its attributes with exclusive access to our equipment editor (not available to other players!). This equipment will also define how your wizard looks in battle.
APPRENTICE + T-SHIRT: Everything from the Apprentice reward plus a limited edition Chaos Reborn T-shirt.

WIZARD LORD: Everything in Forge Master tier - the game, the art, the guide, the music, the personalized equipment - PLUS\r\nyou have the Wizard Lord aura for your wizard character in battles - an impressive visual effect distinguishing you as a Lord, exclusive to backers at this level.\r\nYour wizard will act as a Wizard Lord defending a region in a realm of Chaos controlled by AI. Set your spells and equipment, and receive battle reports for your wizard. You can earn Experience Points and Gold passively from these battles. Your name will be in the credits as a Wizard Lord Backer.
FORGEMASTER + T-SHIRT: Everything from the Forgemaster reward plus a limited edition Chaos Reborn T-shirt.
WIZARD LORD + T-SHIRT: Everything from the Wizard Lord reward plus a limited edition Chaos Reborn T-shirt.

WIZARD KING: Everything in Forge Master tier - the game, the art, the guide, the music, the personalized equipment - PLUS\r\nYou have the Wizard King aura for your wizard character in battles - a regally impressive visual effect distinguishing you as a King, exclusive to backers at this level.\r\nYour wizard will act as a Wizard King ruling over an entire Realm of Chaos. You may choose to design your realm using the Realm Designer Tool - creating the map and populating it with interesting challenges and rewards. You can set your spells and equipment, and receive battle reports for your Wizard King. You can earn Experience Points and Gold passively from these battles. Your name will be in the credits as a Wizard King Backer.
WIZARD KING + T-SHIRT: Everything from the Wizard King reward plus a limited edition Chaos Reborn T-shirt.

DEMIGOD: Everything in Forge Master tier - the game, the art, the guide, the music, the personalized equipment - PLUS
you are a Demigod! You pledge your loyalty to one of the Gods of the Realms of Chaos. You have, from the start, your own guild and can recruit other players. Name your guild and define its rules and loyalties.
You have the Demigod aura for your wizard character in battles - an awesomely impressive visual effect distinguishing you as a Demigod, exclusive to backers at this level.
Your wizard will act as a higher level Wizard King ruling over an entire Realm of Chaos controlled by AI. Build your Realm, set your spells and equipment, and receive battle reports for your wizard. You can earn Experience Points and Gold passively from these battles.
You also have exclusive access to the god forums on the Chaos Reborn website - shaping the future of the game. Your name will be in the credits as a Demigod Backer.

GOD: Everything in Forge Master tier - the game, the art, the guide, the music, the personalized equipment - PLUS
you are one of the Gods of the Realms of Chaos!
Our artists will model your god image according to your likeness, or whatever likeness you choose. Define your god bio, and choose what, exactly, you are a god of.
You can dispense favours and blessings to your followers, or bestow blessings on entire guilds.
You have a god aura for your wizard character in battles - a divinely striking visual effect distinguishing you as a God, exclusive to backers at this level.
Your wizard will act as a Divine Wizard King ruling over an entire Realm of Chaos controlled by AI. Set your spells and equipment, and receive battle reports for your wizard. You can earn Experience Points and Gold passively from these battles.
You have, from the start, your own guild and can recruit other players. Name your guild and define its rules.
You have exclusive access to the god forums on the Chaos Reborn website, shaping the future destiny of the game and the world of Chaos Reborn.
You can communicate directly with your followers via all the guilds that pledge loyalty to you. Your name will be in the credits as a God Backer.

SUPREME BENEFACTOR: Everything in the God tier - the game, the art, the guide, the music, the personalized equipment, God status\r\nPLUS\r\nyour name in the credits as a Supreme Benefactor, and an exclusive invite to our launch party, to be held in London UK, where you can meet with the creators of Chaos Reborn (you must make your own travel and accommodation arrangements).
